answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hello,
Many cities provide their strategic plan for tourism to the public online. I have found some samples that I hope you find helpful.
The City of Lewisville, TX 2008-2011 Tourism Strategic Plan: http://www.google.com/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=3&ved=0CDgQFjAC&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.cityoflewisville.com%2Fwcmsite%2Fpublishing.nsf%2FAttachmentsByTitle%2FTourism%2BStrategic%2BPlanFinal%2F%24FILE%2FTourism%2BStrategic%2BPlanFinal.pdf&ei=LKJ8T6HaDIePiAL8qdTpDQ&usg=AFQjCNFNt3vWbrI4cvfht1-wn3_e7wH2JA
The State of Michigan Tourism 2007-2011 Strategic Plan: http://travelmichigannews.org/mtr/strategic/
The City of Peekskill, NY Cultural Heritage Tourism Strategic Plan:
http://www.cityofpeekskill.com/planningdevelopment/cultural-heritage-tourism-strategic-plan
Pamela Weir
Management Intern
Alliance for Innovation


Hello,

Many cities provide their strategic plan for tourism to the public online. I have found some samples that I hope you find helpful.

The City of Lewisville, TX 2008-2011 Tourism Strategic Plan: http://www.google.com/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=3&ved=0CDgQFjAC&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.cityoflewisville.com%2Fwcmsite%2Fpublishing.nsf%2FAttachmentsByTitle%2FTourism%2BStrategic%2BPlanFinal%2F%24FILE%2FTourism%2BStrategic%2BPlanFinal.pdf&ei=LKJ8T6HaDIePiAL8qdTpDQ&usg=AFQjCNFNt3vWbrI4cvfht1-wn3_e7wH2JA

The City of Peekskill, NY Cultural Heritage Tourism Strategic Plan:
http://www.cityofpeekskill.com/planningdevelopment/cultural-heritage-tourism-strategic-plan

Pamela Weir
Management Intern
Alliance for Innovation

author: Febrinda Sitorus
text:
I am interesting abou the rule of strategic planning for local government. Do you have any criteria for what kind of format i need to be consider to make a strategic plan for local government in tourism ?
big thank you for your help
title: Strategic Planning for Local Government in Tourism
